Information We Collect"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"We may collect the following types of information:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Personal Information: name, email address, phone number, and other details you provide through forms."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Data: pages visited, time spent, browser type, and other analytics data."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Cookies: small files stored on your device to improve user experience."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"2. How We Use Your Information"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"We use your information to:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Provide and improve our services"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Respond to inquiries and support requests"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Send updates, offers, and promotional content (if you opt in)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Analyze website performance and user behavior"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Data Security"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"We take reasonable measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"6. What Are Cookies?"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help the site function properly, improve user experience, and provide analytics."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Types of Cookies We Use"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Essential Cookies – Necessary for the website to work (e.g., login, security)."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Performance Cookies – Help us understand how visitors interact with our site."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Functional Cookies – Remember your preferences and settings."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Advertising Cookies – Deliver relevant ads based on your interests."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"3. How We Use Cookies"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"We use cookies to:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Enable website functionality"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Analyze traffic and performance"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Save your preferences"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Deliver targeted advertising"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"4. Managing Cookies"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the website’s functionality."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Instructions for managing cookies can be found here:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Google Chrome"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Mozilla Firefox"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Microsoft Edge"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"Safari"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","text":"5. Changes to This Policy"}],"level":3},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":"We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated date."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","text":""}]}]
